user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Enable node splitting. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Prepare outputs for subsequent TST export.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting enabled.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now', resolve any parameters for generating profiles without accessing PLEXOS.

tasks.description: Convert/export the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles to TST format for TYNDP using carrier='Hydrogen'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now', export the outputs from the dependent task to TST format.
